cu.explanation_en: Setting MCC to an invalid value (999) will cause PLMN identification failure during network registration.

du.explanation_en: Setting MCC to an invalid value (999) will cause PLMN identification failure during network registration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 MCC 設定為無效值 (999) 會在網路註冊期間導致 PLMN 識別失敗。
